Files Headings

definitions.json

 
[
    {
        "description": "valid definition",
        "schema": {"$ref": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"},
        "tests": [
            {
                "description": "valid definition schema",
                "data": {
                    "definitions": {
                        "foo": {"type": "integer"}
                    }
                },
                "valid": true
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "description": "invalid definition",
        "schema": {"$ref": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"},
        "tests": [
            {
                "description": "invalid definition schema",
                "data": {
                    "definitions": {
                        "foo": {"type": 1}
                    }
                },
                "valid": false
            }
        ]
    }
]
